alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Jackson; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 5:19PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jackson, northeastern Wakulla, Gadsden, northeastern Liberty and Leon Counties through 545 PM EDT/445 PM CDT/... At 519 PM EDT/419 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of West Bainbridge to 10 miles northwest of Havana to 7 miles west of Monticello. Movement was south at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Quincy, Tallahassee, Havana, Midway, Woodville, Florida State University, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Chattahoochee, Greensboro, Florida A And M, Wakulla, Sneads, Gretna, Lake Bradford, Rock Bluff, Wakulla Springs, Florence, Quincy Airport and Lowry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT/700 PM CDT/ for southwestern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Jackson; Leon; Liberty
